enum tmcl_busses

Supported busses and interfaces.

Enumerator:
TMCL_CAN 

CAN bus (currently unsupported)

TMCL_RSXXX 

RS232/RS485 interface

TMCL_IIC 

IIC interface (currently unsupported)

TMCL_NONE 

Marker for uninitialized interface
